email_chain.subject: Inquiry: CFR Rotterdam to Santos - Soybean Meal 8500MT
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

I hope you're doing well. We have a client looking to ship 8500MT of soybean meal from Rotterdam to Santos under CFR terms. Could you provide a vessel offer and initial freight quote?

Best regards,
Julia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Rotterdam to Santos - Soybean Meal 8500MT
email_chain.body:
Hi Julia,

Thanks for reaching out. We can offer the MV OCEAN BREEZE, currently open in Antwerp. Laycan would be Oct 10-15. Initial freight quote is USD 65/MT. Let me know if this works for your client.

Best,
Alex Nguyen

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Rotterdam to Santos - Soybean Meal 8500MT
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thanks for the quick response. The laycan works, but the rate seems a bit high. Market rates are closer to USD 60/MT. Can you revise the offer?

Best,
Julia

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Rotterdam to Santos - Soybean Meal 8500MT
email_chain.body:
Hi Julia,

I understand your concern. After discussing with the owners, we can offer USD 62/MT. This is our best rate given the current market conditions. Let me know if this is acceptable.

Best,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Rotterdam to Santos - Soybean Meal 8500MT
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

USD 62/MT works for us. Please confirm the laycan and send over the contract details.

Best,
Julia

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Rotterdam to Santos - Soybean Meal 8500MT
email_chain.body:
Hi Julia,

Great! Laycan is confirmed for Oct 10-15. I'll send the contract details shortly.

Best,
Alex
